description:
The Radius Pant is a midweight stretch climbing pant with slim leg, for year round climbing in good weather. The Radius Pant is a midweight stretch climbing pant with slim leg, for year round climbing in good weather.

The Radius Pant is made from midweight stretch cotton canvas, with knee articulation and gusset at crotch to allow maximum movement. Featuring two open hand pockets, coin pocket, two rear patch pockets, and a reinforced back hem it's both practical and tough. With slim leg and YKK® zip fly and jeans button fastening, the Radius Pant looks good on and off the crag.

Ideal for cragging or bouldering trip.
name: Rab Radius Pants, Short - Mens
